class cosmpy.protos.cosmwasm.wasm.v1beta1.query_pb2_grpc.QueryServicer¶

Bases: object

Query provides defines the gRPC querier service

AllContractState(request, context)¶

AllContractState gets all raw store data for a single contract

Code(request, context)¶

Code gets the binary code and metadata for a singe wasm code

Codes(request, context)¶

Codes gets the metadata for all stored wasm codes

ContractHistory(request, context)¶

ContractHistory gets the contract code history

ContractInfo(request, context)¶

ContractInfo gets the contract meta data

ContractsByCode(request, context)¶

ContractsByCode lists all smart contracts for a code id

RawContractState(request, context)¶

RawContractState gets single key from the raw store data of a contract

SmartContractState(request, context)¶

SmartContractState get smart query result from the contract

class cosmpy.protos.cosmwasm.wasm.v1beta1.tx_pb2_grpc.MsgServicer¶

Bases: object

Msg defines the wasm Msg service.

ClearAdmin(request, context)¶

ClearAdmin removes any admin stored for a smart contract

ExecuteContract(request, context)¶

Execute submits the given message data to a smart contract

InstantiateContract(request, context)¶

Instantiate creates a new smart contract instance for the given code id.

MigrateContract(request, context)¶

Migrate runs a code upgrade/ downgrade for a smart contract

StoreCode(request, context)¶

StoreCode to submit Wasm code to the system

UpdateAdmin(request, context)¶

UpdateAdmin sets a new admin for a smart contract
